Step 4: Scale and extrude the sketch - Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75 - Extrude the scaled 2D sketch along its normal direction by 0.015 units The resulting part is a 3D rectangular prism with a triangular cutout. The dimensions are as follows: - Length: 0.75 units - Width: 0.75 units - Height: 0.03 units _Note: No additional operations are needed as this is the first part._ Continue this process for the remaining parts in the CAD assembly JSON. Make sure to use the same headings and conventions for each part.</description>
